channel.title: Softmax on Vidyasagar Bhargava
channel.description: Recent content in Softmax on Vidyasagar Bhargava

item.title: Softmax function from scratch
item.description: Softmax is a generalization of logistic regression which can be use for multi-class classification. The softmax function squashes the outputs of each unit to be between 0 and 1, just like a sigmoid function. But it also divides each output such that the total sum of the outputs is equal to 1. Softmax Function :- Softmax is a generalization of logistic regression which can be use for multi-class classification.
